name: Irileth

aspects.trouble: Suspicious of Outsiders and Unforgiving of Mistakes
other_aspects: Skilled Former Mercenary with a Grim Sense of Duty

stunts: Always Vigilant: +2 to Notice to detect ambushes or sneaky behavior in Whiterun.
Housecarl's Fury: +2 to Fight when defending Balgruuf or Whiterun against a direct threat.

trust_clock.description: Represents how much Irileth trusts the party to protect Whiterun and follow orders.

relationships.Thane of Whiterun (Player): Watches closely (initially skeptical until they prove themselves)
relationships.Dunmer of Skyrim: Feels she must prove her worth among Nords

personality_notes.speaking_style: Blunt, direct, and curt. Irileth doesn't mince words and often barks commands. Carries a Dunmeri accent and a soldier's cadence.
motivations: Fulfill her duty to keep Jarl Balgruuf safe
Protect Whiterun's citizens from threats (dragons, invaders, criminals)
Earn respect in a Nord city as a Dark Elf by action and honor
fears: Failing in her duty as Balgruuf's protector
Whiterun falling due to her oversight
Her past mercenary mistakes coming back to haunt her or the Jarl
quirks: Frequently scans rooftops and high points for threats even during conversation
Keeps a hand near her sword hilt at all times
Has a very slight smirk when battle is imminent (she lives for a good fight)

combat_tactics: Irileth is an agile melee combatant. In a fight, she issues quick orders to nearby guards and moves decisively to engage high-priority threats (like enemy leaders or monsters). She uses her Dunmer agility and flames (destruction magic) to surprise foes, but primarily wields a curved Akaviri sword. She will place herself between danger and the Jarl (or the party if they've earned her respect).
scene_triggers: First Dragon fight at the Watchtower (she accompanies the party)
Confrontations at Whiterun's gates or palace (Irileth steps in)
Battle of Whiterun defense (leading troops on the walls)
Any time the Jarl is threatened or an important fight breaks out in Whiterun
